block.p: CALLAWAY GOLF CO., Carlsbad, Calif., named Brad Holiday executive vice president and chief financial officer, effective Aug. 15. He succeeds David Rane, who resigned. Mr. Holiday had been vice president for financial planning and analysis at Gateway Inc.

THE CHASE MANHATTAN BANK, New York, named Gail A. Schneider, Chase Investment Services Group executive, to the post of executive vice president and head of a new business unit called Regional Consumer Services.

CALLAWAY GOLF CO., Carlsbad, Calif., named Brad Holiday executive vice president and chief financial officer, effective Aug. 15. He succeeds David Rane, who resigned. Mr. Holiday had been vice president for financial planning and analysis at Gateway Inc.

THE CHASE MANHATTAN BANK, New York, named Gail A. Schneider, Chase Investment Services Group executive, to the post of executive vice president and head of a new business unit called Regional Consumer Services.

ECHOSTAR COMMUNICATIONS CORP., Littleton, Colo., named Michael McDonnell chief financial officer, succeeding Steven Schaver, who was promoted in April to president at EchoStar's international unit. Mr. McDonnell had been a partner at PricewaterhouseCoopers.
GOYA FOODS INC., Secaucus, N.J., named Andy Unanue, vice president and general manager, to the post of chief operating officer. He succeeds Joseph F. Unanue, who died.
